text:
その通り!
心に響く素晴らしい
書き筋だったわ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: #280037;background-color: #EFA4FF;left: 1.56%;top: 1.98%;width: 17.00%;height: 18.85%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
ファンタジーの
辻褄が合う説得力も
十分あったし
style: font-size: 14px;color: #280037;background-color: #EFA4FF;left: 20.69%;top: 8.13%;width: 17.38%;height: 19.84%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
ジョージはどう?
どう思う?
style: font-size: 14px;color: #280037;background-color: #EFA4FF;left: 19.19%;top: 31.75%;width: 20.13%;height: 12.30%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: #573F01;background-color: #FFFC81;left: 54.81%;top: 0.99%;width: 8.88%;height: 7.74%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
あ、ゴメン
いえ、あなたの
言った通りだと
思うわよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: #573F01;background-color: #FFFC81;left: 54.44%;top: 19.05%;width: 17.13%;height: 15.48%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: #280037;background-color: #EA81FF;left: 62.31%;top: 47.22%;width: 13.00%;height: 14.09%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
最中よ!
読むの遅いの
知ってるよね!
style: font-size: 14px;color: #573F01;background-color: #FFFC81;left: 83.69%;top: 53.17%;width: 15.63%;height: 16.67%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
